QuestData.Title: It Springs Eternal
QuestData.Description:
Water is a sacred resource in dese dunes, but those within dis temple never know thirst.
Akunda commands de storm, allowing de nearby spring to never run empty.
Unfortunately, our eternal water source attracts a variety of animals dat are a plague upon our temple.
Rid de valley of their presence before you return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Redrock Scavengers and Redrock Howlers near The Eternal Spring.
